12.content: how will she gain weight?
12.title: Morgan

122.content: back when morgan was 11 and lived with both of her parent. what she did not know was that they were both cultist practicing spells and magic. one day they found a spell that said for the person this spell is place upon. they would be protected and know no life without love. when they read this they started to get prepared to do it on morgan. they really wanted her to find love and already at the age of 11 she was very much a partyer. that night they chained morgan to the table and started the spell. morgan waking up started to fight the chains, but a 4 foot 7, 70 pound girl could not do much. quickly they finished the spell..... and nothing happened. shuddenly her father started to deslove into a black mist that race to morgan. forcing itself in her mouth. when it was all over a dark mark showed on her exposed belly ( look at this pic http://cdn.walyou.com/wp-content/uploads... ) the tattoo was showed that the spell on now on her. morgan not know she would now become lazier, have a greater hunger for food, and if gained weight she would not be able to lose it again plus if she dates the wrong man over the first month she would gain 30 more pounds.
122.title: Magical

1221.content:
the once small 4 foot 8, 70 pound girl was no more. now she was a beautiful adult at 5 foot 6 and 155 pounds. waking up hungry was not uncommon for her what she had not relished was if it was not for her to previous boyfriends she would be 90 pounds and thin. the added weight made her belly chubby and jiggly, hips wide and her thighs round; but she did not care much. getting up and and walking over to the full body mirror she saw herself. she was just wearing her under, which were getting to be on the tight side for her. her face was now softer and rounder, going down to her ample DD chest and her belly with the tattoo on it. the tattoo look like it was still brand new, except there was no redness. it had also stretched perfectly over her belly looking she had gotten only days ago. turning to the side she saw her chubby belly sticking out. sucking it in you could still tell she had some chub. god i with i could be thin. flashed though her mind. only for a moment though.
reaching down to the floor she grab some shorts, putting them on gave her a muffin top and were tight around her thighs. then finding a old shirt from when she was 11, putting it on was hard, she had to smash her chest against herself and quickly pull it down. the shirt only covered half way from her chest to her belly button, showing her chubby belly and tattoo off nicely.walking out of her room and into the kitchen she found two breafest burrito and took them to her room to eat and watch tv.
she continued to eat like this though the whole day, never really leaving bed. until her friend called that night and told to get dress because they were going to the bar. getting up she striped off the shorts and shirt and put on a tight black dress. she liked this dress, it was tight in the middle but it made her look thinner and showed off her great rack.
1221.title: 11 years later

152.content:
Nicole is a 13 year old girl with long blonde hair typically fashioned in a pony tail. She is slim weighing 90 pounds with a height of 5ft 2. She is the daughter of health nuts who always encouraged her to exercise and eat healthy. With daily participation in exercises with her fitness instructor mother, Nicole was the culmination of teenage girl health. However all this is about to change...

Becky is a 14 year old girl with silky brown hair. She fiercely hates sports but people always pressured her into joining teams. Now Becky has devised a plan to stop the harassment, she would get so fat no one would think of asking her to play.
152.title: naw, naw.  not my type

choices: lost her parents in a car accident
1521.content:
Nicole was born into a health obsessed family, eating food deemed acceptable by her parents' scrutinizing eyes. While her friends could eat junk food, Nicole was forced to consume veggies and fruits. Nicole's parents regularly dragged Nicole along for jogs or exercise sessions. Nicole's mother was particularly demanding of her daughter, insisting that she be the health ideal of females, even going as far as taking routine measurements and inspecting Nicole for flab by feeling her body. And to her mother's delight Nicole lived up to her expectations, attaining the ideal figure.

However one day Nicole...
1521.title: Nicole
